query:
-- Comparar registros por data de criação
SELECT 
  'Mercados' as entidade,
  DATE(createdAt) as data,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade
FROM mercados_unicos
GROUP BY DATE(createdAt)

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Clientes' as entidade,
  DATE(createdAt) as data,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade
FROM clientes
GROUP BY DATE(createdAt)

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Concorrentes' as entidade,
  DATE(createdAt) as data,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade
FROM concorrentes
GROUP BY DATE(createdAt)

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Leads' as entidade,
  DATE(createdAt) as data,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade
FROM leads
GROUP BY DATE(createdAt)

ORDER BY entidade, data DESC;
